title: Salsa Verde with Preserved Lemon
ingredients: ½preserved lemon, homemade (see this page) or store-bought (such as Mina), seeded and very finely chopped
3tablespoons fresh lemon juice (about 1 lemon), plus more as needed
directions: 1. In a small bowl, combine the shallot, capers, preserved lemon, parsley, lemon juice, pepper flakes, and ⅔ cup olive oil and mix. Season with ¼ teaspoon salt and ¼ teaspoon black pepper. Adjust with more oil or lemon juice and salt and black pepper to taste.
